Production Co: Maven Pictures, Scope Pictures, France Télévisions, Eyesteelfilm, The Orchard, Eurimages, CG Cinéma, France 2 Cinéma, StudioCanal
Synopsis: Millie is a hardworking, tough and protective Los Angeles single mother with an affection for homeless children. Her neighbor Obie is the local loose cannon -- and the only white man -- in an area largely inhabited by African-Americans, Latinos and Koreans. With racial tensions running high, Millie and Obie appear to be unlikely allies. But following the acquittal of four of the officers accused of beating Rodney King, the two of them must navigate the gathering chaos in the city.
Title: Kings
